product_name: White Sierra High Camp Rain Jacket - Men's - Special Buy
long_description: Waterproof, windproof and ready for adventure, the men's White Sierra High Camp rain jacket keeps you comfortable when rain and cold threaten to ruin your time outside. Durable ripstop polyester fabric features a waterproof, breathable laminate and critically taped seams for waterproof protection. Adjustable hood keeps the elements outs. Zippered chest pocket and zippered handwarmer pockets offer storage for small items. White Sierra High Camp rain jacket features adjustable cuffs and an adjustable hem to keep the cold out. Special buy.
short_description: Waterproof, windproof and ready for adventure, the men's White Sierra High Camp rain jacket keeps you comfortable when rain and cold threaten to ruin your time outside.
